snippet: Parishioners who have occupied a Roman Catholic church since it was closed 11 years ago will ask the Supreme Court to settle their dispute with the Boston archdiocese.
abstract: Parishioners of St Frances X Cabrini Roman Catholic Church will ask Supreme Court to review ruling by Massachusetts court that found they were trespassing; church was closed in 2004 due to reorganization by Boston archdiocese in wake of clergy sex abuse scandal.
lead_paragraph: Parishioners who have occupied a Roman Catholic church since it was closed 11 years ago will ask the Supreme Court to settle their dispute with the Boston archdiocese.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Church Occupiers Appeal to High Court
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Church Occupiers Appeal to High Court
